page.title: 08Sir's Page
page.content:
'Sir,this page is for you to write about life in Camberley in 1985. OK?'
Well- There's{nowhere to park}even if the Car Park has trebled in size. The council have got a mania for building {mini-roundabouts.}They spring up like pimples on the landscape.
We are a very{hi-tech}community. Most of our industry is electronics and computers including{Sinclair.}There is an air of prosperity about even this year.{Unemployment}is below average.
I am surprised at the things the students{didn't write about}like our American Football Team, breakdancing in the town centre, drugs, parties, and all the things they spend my lessons talking about. - Will that do? EHT05560228
